title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 [FINAL] Foxy Games
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 v 1.1.2.2 
RePack by Foxy Games
Year: 2014 
Platform: PC 
Developer: Red Dot Games 
Publisher: PlayWay 
Size: 447MB
Language: Russian, English, French, German, Dutch , 
Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish
Genre: Simulator / 3D


Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 - it is not difficult to guess, the simulator car mechanic! Now you have a great way to learn what it means to be the owner of your own workshop!
game will show you the wonderful world of daily tasks, which involved all the garages, ranging from small garages to dealerships and service centers will be an excellent gift for all automotive enthusiasts.

Features:
Communicate with car owners and evaluate the necessary repairs
Order parts and materials necessary for the operation of the workshop, including the parts used to help your customers save money.
Buy repair manuals, to become the best mechanic and earn more money.
Work with eight different types of cars, including sedans, compact, crossover, minibuses and limousines.
Become a true master - you will find over 120 different tasks, including repairing brakes and transmission, body work, similarity collapse, oil change and consumables, tuning chips and much, much more.

Features of Release:
"It is based on a licensed version of the game.
"Do not cut / no recoded.
"updated to version: v1.1.2.2.

How to change language:
After Installed program:
1. Extract and open crack folder
2. Open file ALI213.ini/SKIDROW.ini/3DM.ini with notepad
3. find this line "Language = russian" edit it to "Language = english"

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor: Core 2 Duo - 1,8 GHz  Core i5
RAM: 2048 MB  4096 MB
Video card: GeForce 9800GT, (512 MB), (DirectX9)  GeForce GTX650Ti, (1024 MB), (DirectX9)
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 1.1 GB
